title: Best early October Prime Day laptop deals
description:
Amazon’s annual Prime Day sales event is about to kick off but you already have a chance to score big on some great laptop deals. This year, October Prime Day will run from October 10 through October 11 and should include great deals on everything from gaming laptops to productivity machines.

We’ve sifted through all of the humdrum sales to pinpoint only the very best laptops on sale during this year’s second Prime Day. You’ll need to be a Prime member to take advantage of these steep discounts. Not a Prime member? Not a problem. By signing up for the 30-day trial, you can get Amazon Prime for free.

We’re also including deals from other retailers like Best Buy and Walmart. Our picks offer strong processing and graphics perf

title: Save up to $400 off office lighting with these discounted lamps
description:
When it comes to doing your best work at home or in the office, lighting is an often overlooked consideration. Whether you’re burning the midnight oil and need some softer light, or you need to brighten things up to get going in the morning, a Lamp Depot Minimalist LED Corner Floor Lamp is rated 4.2/5 stars by purchasers and a valuable asset to customize your lighting no matter what you need. During Deal Days — a sale running through October 15th — you can save a bundle on these lamps.
